resources.string: The game is like Minesweeper: When you click on a cell, a number appears indicating how many mines are nearby. Be careful, because if you click on a cell that contains a hidden mine, you\'ll lose. If you suspect or are sure there\'s a mine, long-press the cell to flag it. DO NOT long-press a cell without a mine, or you\'ll lose. You win once you\'ve flagged all the mines.
You lose. Do u want to retry?
